lore.text: クリスタルを大胆に使って
作られた神秘的なハンマー。

functions.tag: {ui:{smithable:1b,upgrade:[[{count:6,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal_shards","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1010]},"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"クリスタルの欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"小さなクリスタルの欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"氷のような透明感を持つ。"}]']}},{count:5,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1011]},"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"クリスタル"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"きらきらと輝く碧い結晶。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"神秘の力を内に秘めている。"}]']}},{count:3,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/wooden_branch","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1046]},"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"木の枝"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"そこらに落ちている枝木。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"なんとも柔らかにしなる。"}]']}}],[{count:9,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal_shards","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1010]},"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"クリスタルの欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"小さなクリスタルの欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"氷のような透明感を持つ。"}]']}},{count:7,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/crystal","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1011]},"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"クリスタル"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"きらきらと輝く碧い結晶。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"神秘の力を内に秘めている。"}]']}},{count:4,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/iron","custom_model_data":{"floats":[1005]},"custom_
